author: ComputerMagazine
title: From WSJ.com: WSJD: Facebook Is Pummeled by User-Data Blowback
text: Facebook Is Pummeled by User-Data Blowback From WSJ.com: WSJD: Facebook Is Pummeled by User-Data Blowback   Facebook confronted an intensifying crisis as political leaders in the U.S. and Europe called for aggressive inquiries into whether the technology giant failed to stop improper access and handling of user data, scrutiny that sent the company’s stock to its biggest decline in four years. This syndicated article brought to you by Computer Magazine from WSJ.com: WSJD. View the rest of the article at the original publisher's site here Posted in: ComputerMagazine.com , Syndicated , Wall Stree Journal Tagged : ComputerMagazine.com , PAID , Syndicated , wsj Post navigation Your email address will not be published.
